seller_description: Clorox Disinfecting Wipes are a powerful cleaning solution with a TripleWeave texture that cleans three times better, effectively tackling tough messes and removing 99.9% of allergens. Proven to kill 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus in just 15 seconds, these wipes are perfect for everyday disinfecting. They are safe for use on hard, non-porous surfaces such as finished wood, sealed granite, stainless steel, and more, making them suitable for homes, offices, classrooms, and car interiors. Each canister contains 75 lemon-scented wipes, offering a bleach-free alternative for cleaning and deodorizing. Clorox Wipes also remove stains from fabrics, including grass, sweat, food, and makeup. Convenient and disposable, these wipes provide an effective and fresh cleaning solution for any space.
review: Imagine a cleaning companion so efficient it feels like wielding a magic wand against messes—Clorox Disinfecting Wipes are precisely that! With their invigorating lemon scent and powerful germ-killing properties, these wipes effortlessly transform every cleaning session into a breeze of freshness. They not only eliminate 99.9% of bacteria and viruses but also leave surfaces sparkling clean, from granite countertops to wooden tables. Perfect for every nook and cranny, these wipes are like sunshine in a canister, ready to brighten your day and your home!
Expected_output: The seller’s description of Clorox Disinfecting Wipes highlights their effectiveness in killing 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, their TripleWeave texture for superior cleaning, and their versatility on various surfaces. The seller’s image portrays neatly packed canisters with clear labels, showcasing the scents and functionality of the product. The buyer’s image aligns well with the seller’s depiction, showing identical canisters with the correct branding and advertised features like the “Kills 99.9% of Viruses & Bacteria” label. However, the buyer’s review is absent, leaving no feedback on their satisfaction or dissatisfaction with the product's performance. Based on the provided visuals and the alignment between the seller's promises and the buyer’s images, the product appears to meet expectations. There are no discrepancies in the product’s appearance or features, and the seller has delivered as promised. Any further insights on usability would require direct buyer input, but the seller’s representation remains faultless.
label: -1: buyers opinion
